title: The concern Branch Officer of Town Planning (1) or to the concerned Authority, as the case may be, shall grant Occupancy Certificate or reject the application giving specific reason within one month from the receipt of application
clause_text: The concern Branch Officer of Town Planning (1) or to the concerned Authority, as the case may be, shall grant Occupancy Certificate or reject the application giving specific reason within one month from the receipt of application.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
